trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Schertz
There were no other sightings in Schertz on or around October 22nd 2012
Summary: appeared and disappeared several times. appeared like a flock of birds would in the sky, but looked more like balloons, mylar reflecting light, then yellow light bulbs , then disappearing and reappearing several times over 3-4 minutes
divs: Sighting Detailsat the local elementary school trying to fly a kite, and first noticed movement like a flock of birds, but it was a large group of yellow lights maybe 25-50 or more. They were visible for a few seconds, then disappeared, then reappeared as a reflection kinda like mylar balloons, then disappeared, and reappeared again as a reflective group. Kinda like the way the sunlight reflects on fish scales. Perfectly cloud free sky, object appeared and disappeared several times as it moved slowly from sse to nnw. First thought it was a flock of birds, then thought maybe a group of mylar balloons, but it was much bigger than either of these. Object has been observed several times by members of my family. It slowly moves across the sky coming in and out of sight either as lights or a reflection from the sun, then totally disappears.
